</div>
</div>
</div>
    <!-- shareShader =============================================================================== -->
    <script>

    var gDlgShare = null;

    function doShareShader( coords )
    {
    if( gDlgShare==null )
    {
    gDlgShare = {};
    gDlgShare.mEle = document.getElementById("dlgShareShader");
    gDlgShare.mIsMoving = false;
    gDlgShare.mStartPosX = 0;
    gDlgShare.mStartPosY = 0;

    var eleHeader =  document.getElementById( "dlgShareShaderHeader" );
    eleHeader.onmousedown = function(ev) { gDlgShare.mIsMoving = true; gDlgShare.mStartPosX = ev.screenX - gDlgShare.mEle.offsetLeft; gDlgShare.mStartPosY = ev.screenY - gDlgShare.mEle.offsetTop; };
    eleHeader.onmouseup   = function(ev) { gDlgShare.mIsMoving = false; };

    gDlgShare.mEle.style.left = coords.mX + 32 + "px";
    gDlgShare.mEle.style.top  = coords.mY - 100 + "px";
    gDlgShare.mVisible = false;

    var ele = document.getElementById("shaderURL");
    var str = "https://www.shadertoy.com/view/" + gShaderID;
    ele.textContent = str;
    ele.href = str;
    }

    document.onmousemove = function( ev )
    {

    if( gDlgShare!=null && gDlgShare.mIsMoving )
        {
            gDlgShare.mEle.style.left = (ev.screenX-gDlgShare.mStartPosX) + "px";
            gDlgShare.mEle.style.top  = (ev.screenY-gDlgShare.mStartPosY) + "px";
        }
    }

    if( gDlgShare.mVisible )
    {
        gDlgShare.mVisible = false;
	    gDlgShare.mEle.style.opacity = "0.0";
        gDlgShare.mEle.style.visibility = "hidden";
    }
    else
    {
        gDlgShare.mVisible = true;
	    gDlgShare.mEle.style.opacity = "1.0";
        gDlgShare.mEle.style.visibility = "visible";
    }
}
</script>

<div id="dlgShareShader" class="dialog">
    <div class="dialogHeader" id="dlgShareShaderHeader">
      <div class="dialogTitle">Share your shader</div>
      <div class="dialogCloseButton" onclick='doShareShader(null)'></div>
    </div>
    <div class="dialogContent">
    <div class="dialogContentBody">
      <b>Direct link:</b><br>
      <br>
      Just copy and paste this URL below: <a class="regular" id="shaderURL"></a><br>
      <br>
      <b>Embed:</b><br>
      <br>
      <textarea readonly rows="4" cols="52"><iframe width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" src="https://www.shadertoy.com/embed/4cfcDX?gui=true&t=10&paused=true&muted=false" allowfullscreen></iframe></textarea>    </div>
    </div>
</div>
    <!-- addToPlaylist =============================================================================== -->
    <script>
    var gDlgAddToPlaylists = { mVisible: false };

    function iAddShaderToPlaylist( playlistID, shaderID, checkbox )
    {
        var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
        req.onload = function()
        {
            var jsn = req.response;
            if( jsn==null ) return;
            if( jsn.result!=0 )
            {
                checkbox.checked = false;
                alert( "The shader couldn't be added to the playlist. Please try again." );
                console.log( "Error: The shader couldn't be added to the playlist. Please try again." );
            }
        }
        req.open( "POST", "/shadertoy", true );
        req.responseType = "json";
        req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
        var str = "pas=1&pid=" + playlistID + "&sid=" + shaderID;
        req.send( str );
    }

    function iDelShaderToPlaylist( playlistID, shaderID, checkbox )
    {
        var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
        req.onload = function()
        {
            var jsn = req.response;
            if( jsn==null ) return;
            if( jsn.result!=0 )
            {
                checkbox.checked = true;
                alert( "The shader couldn't be deleted from the playlist. Please try again." );
                console.log( "Error: The shader couldn't be removed from the playlist. Please try again." );
            }
        }
        req.open( "POST", "/shadertoy", true );
        req.responseType = "json";
        req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
        var str = "prs=1&pid=" + playlistID + "&sid=" + shaderID;
        req.send( str );
    }

    function doAddToPlaylist( shaderID, coords )
    {
	
        var ele = document.getElementById("dlgAddToPlaylist");
        if( gDlgAddToPlaylists.mVisible )
        {
            gDlgAddToPlaylists.mVisible = false;

	        ele.style.opacity = "0.0";
            ele.style.visibility = "hidden";
        }
        else
        {
            gDlgAddToPlaylists.mVisible = true;

            ele.style.left = coords.mX + 32 + "px";
            ele.style.top  = coords.mY -  2 + "px";

	        ele.style.opacity = "1.0";
            ele.style.visibility = "visible";

            // get available playlists
            var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
            req.onload = function()
            {
                var jsn = req.response;
                if( jsn==null ) return;

                var numPlaylists = jsn.playlists.id.length;

                if( numPlaylists==0 ) return;

                var eleSelect = document.getElementById( "dlgAddPlaylistList" );

                while(eleSelect.firstChild) { eleSelect.removeChild(eleSelect.firstChild); }

                for( let i=0; i<numPlaylists; i++ )
                {
					if( jsn.playlists.system[i]==1 && jsn.playlists.name[i]=="Loved") continue;

                    var eleOption = document.createElement("input");
                    eleOption.type = "checkbox";   
                    eleOption.checked = (jsn.playlists.exists[i]===1);
                    eleOption.name = "dlgAddPlaylistListOptions";
                    eleOption.id = "dlgAddPlaylistListOption" + i;
                    eleOption.value = jsn.playlists.name[i];
                    eleOption.onclick = function()
                                        {
                                            if( this.checked )
                                            {
                                                iAddShaderToPlaylist( jsn.playlists.id[i], shaderID, this );
                                            }
                                            else
                                            {
                                                iDelShaderToPlaylist( jsn.playlists.id[i], shaderID, this );
                                            }
                                        };
                    eleSelect.appendChild(eleOption);

                    var label = document.createElement("label")
                    label.htmlFor = "dlgAddPlaylistListOption" + i;
                    var name = jsn.playlists.name[i];
                    name += " (" + ((jsn.playlists.published[i]==0)?"private":"public") + ")";
                    var eleText = document.createTextNode(name);
                    label.appendChild(eleText);
                    eleSelect.appendChild(label);

                    eleSelect.appendChild(document.createElement("br"));
                }

                eleSelect.appendChild(document.createElement("br"));

                var eleSpan = document.createElement("span");
                    eleSpan.appendChild(document.createTextNode("To create new playlists, go to your "));
                    var eleA = document.createElement("a");
                    eleA.href = "/profile";
                        eleA.appendChild(document.createTextNode("profile page"));
                    eleSpan.appendChild(eleA);
                eleSelect.appendChild(eleSpan);
                
                eleSelect.appendChild(document.createElement("br"));
            };
            req.open( "POST", "/shadertoy", true );
            req.responseType = "json";
            req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
            var str = "psg=1&sid=" + shaderID;
            req.send( str );

        }

    }
</script>

<style>
div#dlgAddToPlaylist
{
     width:320px;
     height:240px;
     position:absolute;
}
</style>

<div id="dlgAddToPlaylist" class="dialog">

    <div class="dialogHeader" id="dlgAddToPlaylistHeader" >
      <div class="dialogTitle">Add to playlist</div>
      <div class="dialogCloseButton" onclick='doAddToPlaylist(null)'></div>
    </div>

    <div class="dialogContent">
      <div class="dialogContentBody" id="dlgAddPlaylistList">
      </div>
    </div>
</div>
    <!-- report =============================================================================== -->
    <script>

    function doReportShader( shaderID, coords )
    {
        doAlert( coords, 320, 
                 "Report Shader", 
                 "Are you sure you want to report this shader?", 
                  true, 
                  function() 
                  { 
                    var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
                    req.onload = function()
                    {
                        var jsn = req.response;
                        if( jsn==null ) return;
                        if( jsn.result==0 ) alert( "Shader has been reported!" );            
                    };
                    req.open( "POST", "/shadertoy", true );
                    req.responseType = "json";
                    req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
                    var str = "s=" + shaderID + "&r=1";
                    req.send( str );
                  }
        );
    }
</script>
</body>

</html>

item.description:
This is a personal note of some useful shader tricks

Noises

Value Noise

Gradient Noise

Perlin

Simplex

Noise31


float noise( in vec3 x ) // in [0,1]
{
    vec3 p = floor(x);
    vec3 f = fract(x);

    f = f*f*(3.0-2.0*f);

    float n = p.x + p.y*57.0 + 113.0*p.z;

    float res = mix(mix(mix( hash(n+  0.0), hash(n+  1.0),f.x),
                        mix( hash(n+ 57.0), hash(n+ 58.0),f.x),f.y),
                    mix(mix( hash(n+113.0), hash(n+114.0),f.x),
                        mix( hash(n+170.0), hash(n+171.0),f.x),f.y),f.z);
    return res;
}

[!Hash 是不连续的 noise] value noise ?

Noise21

float hash11( float n )    // in [0,1]
{
    return fract(sin(n)*43758.5453);
}

vec2 hash22( vec2 p ) {
	p = vec2(dot(p,vec2(127.1,311.7)), dot(p,vec2(269.5,183.3)));
	return -1.0 + 2.0*fract(sin(p)*43758.5453123);
}

vec3 hash33(vec3 p3)
{
	p3 = fract(p3 * vec3(.1031,.11369,.13787));
    p3 += dot(p3, p3.yxz+19.19);
    return -1.0 + 2.0 * fract(vec3(p3.x+p3.y, p3.x+p3.z, p3.y+p3.z)*p3.zyx);
}

float noise( in vec2 p ) {
    const float K1 = 0.366025404; // (sqrt(3)-1)/2;
    const float K2 = 0.211324865; // (3-sqrt(3))/6;
	vec2 i = floor(p + (p.x+p.y)*K1);	
    vec2 a = p - i + (i.x+i.y)*K2;
    vec2 o = (a.x>a.y) ? vec2(1.0,0.0) : vec2(0.0,1.0); //vec2 of = 0.5 + 0.5*vec2(sign(a.x-a.y), sign(a.y-a.x));
    vec2 b = a - o + K2;
	vec2 c = a - 1.0 + 2.0*K2;
    vec3 h = max(0.5-vec3(dot(a,a), dot(b,b), dot(c,c) ), 0.0 );
	vec3 n = h*h*h*h*vec3( dot(a,hash(i+0.0)), dot(b,hash(i+o)), dot(c,hash(i+1.0)));
    return dot(n, vec3(70.0));	
}

Voronoise (celular)

Great For 爬行动物皮肤纹理或干燥地砖

This is a personal note of some useful shader tricks

Noises

Value Noise

Gradient Noise

Perlin

Simplex

Noise31


float noise( in vec3 x ) // in [0,1]
{
    vec3 p = floor(x);
    vec3 f = fract(x);

    f = f*f*(3.0-2.0*f);

    float n = p.x + p.y*57.0 + 113.0*p.z;

    float res = mix(mix(mix( hash(n+  0.0), hash(n+  1.0),f.x),
                        mix( hash(n+ 57.0), hash(n+ 58.0),f.x),f.y),
                    mix(mix( hash(n+113.0), hash(n+114.0),f.x),
                        mix( hash(n+170.0), hash(n+171.0),f.x),f.y),f.z);
    return res;
}

[!Hash 是不连续的 noise] value noise ?

Noise21

float hash11( float n )    // in [0,1]
{
    return fract(sin(n)*43758.5453);
}

vec2 hash22( vec2 p ) {
	p = vec2(dot(p,vec2(127.1,311.7)), dot(p,vec2(269.5,183.3)));
	return -1.0 + 2.0*fract(sin(p)*43758.5453123);
}

vec3 hash33(vec3 p3)
{
	p3 = fract(p3 * vec3(.1031,.11369,.13787));
    p3 += dot(p3, p3.yxz+19.19);
    return -1.0 + 2.0 * fract(vec3(p3.x+p3.y, p3.x+p3.z, p3.y+p3.z)*p3.zyx);
}

float noise( in vec2 p ) {
    const float K1 = 0.366025404; // (sqrt(3)-1)/2;
    const float K2 = 0.211324865; // (3-sqrt(3))/6;
	vec2 i = floor(p + (p.x+p.y)*K1);	
    vec2 a = p - i + (i.x+i.y)*K2;
    vec2 o = (a.x>a.y) ? vec2(1.0,0.0) : vec2(0.0,1.0); //vec2 of = 0.5 + 0.5*vec2(sign(a.x-a.y), sign(a.y-a.x));
    vec2 b = a - o + K2;
	vec2 c = a - 1.0 + 2.0*K2;
    vec3 h = max(0.5-vec3(dot(a,a), dot(b,b), dot(c,c) ), 0.0 );
	vec3 n = h*h*h*h*vec3( dot(a,hash(i+0.0)), dot(b,hash(i+o)), dot(c,hash(i+1.0)));
    return dot(n, vec3(70.0));	
}

Voronoise (celular)

Great For 爬行动物皮肤纹理或干燥地砖

Composited Noise

FBM

float fbm( vec3 p )    // in [0,1]
{
	if (ANIM) p += iTime;
    float f;
    f  = 0.5000*noise( p ); p = m*p*2.02;
    f += 0.2500*noise( p ); p = m*p*2.03;
    f += 0.1250*noise( p ); p = m*p*2.01;
    f += 0.0625*noise( p );
    return f;
}

float fbm(vec2 uv) {
	float total = 0.0, amplitude = 0.1;
	for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
		// 每一次迭代，增加一层 noise，即添加一层 color
		// amplitude 控制噪音的 数量
		// frequency 控制尺度的降低
		total += noise(uv) * amplitude;
		uv = frequency * uv;
		amplitude *= 0.;
	}
	return total;
}

自然界的形状可以理解为 不同数量 * 不同尺度的形状 的叠加

a simple sum of noise waves with increasing frequencies and decreasing amplitudes.

Shapes

圆环

   col = 5. / abs( length( uv +  center ) - 0.5 ) / 4e2;

item.description:
Immusia

  • 光照增强

  • 镜面反射

  • 相机高度

  • Endless

Spatial size: 决定一小块的面积，其中一小块中的波浪细节固定

The width of the ocean surface area being simulated, in meters. This also determines the size of the generated mesh, or the displaced area. Of course, you can scale the object with the Ocean modifier in Object Mode to tweak the apparent size in your scene.

size: scale，(displace 下)扩大原有object,可能导致mesh细节丢失

Environments:

  1. West lake
  2. Outside earth, rotating
  3. Plastic Beach
  4. Rooftop
  5. The Wall

其中真实场景考虑使用 photogremetry
